summary: Research revealed 25 orphaned Claude processes consuming 10.7 GB memory. Original proposal to add 'Stage 8: Session Cleanup' to agents is not feasible - agents cannot manage their own process lifecycle. Recommended approach: configure cleanupPeriodDays=7, add systemd timer for orphaned process cleanup, and use shell aliases for monitoring.
